1�As I thought...they were trying to protect their eggs...
1�But they don't even try to understand...
1�Ulrich, why!?
1�You will never get away with this, Ulrich!
e!�...Cornelia!?
1�Cornelia!!!
1�No... NOOOOO!
1�Ulrich, wait!
1�I...couldn't let you die here, Raogrimm... There are people who need you...
1�Huh. Nothing.With all the Quadav guarding the place, you think we'd find a treasure or two!
1�C'mon, let's move! Let's just finish this job and go.
1�Is that all you've got, Raogrimm!?
1�Why? Because I never liked you, that's why!
1�Wh-what have I done!?
1�What is the matter, Babenn?
1�That is unfortunate... As always, they don't even try to understand.
1�Lord Raogrimm... We've found the Quadav temple in the mines, as you suspected.I-I could not stop them.
1�Indeed. Without them, we would not have been able to dig that mine.Now, finally, we can compete with San d'Oria for power.
1�Those ??explosives??--pretty amazing, aren't they?
1�Heh, Quadav aren't good enough to live in there! One blast should take care of them...
1�So, that's what magicite looks like.
1�What are they trying to do with it, though?
1�Who are you!?
1�The Shadow Lord!? It can't be!His powers couldn't have returned!?
1�Then it is true.The beastmen are trying to bring back the Shadow Lord.
1�...Be careful.
1�You are too late...I have already awakened.
1�Your rage, cowardice, envy, arrogance, and apathy...from these I will spread the bane that will destroy Vana'diel.
1�Your kind awakened me...and this time, you will be destroyed!
1�You cannot stop me.Vana'diel will be the grave for you and all your kind!
�Investigate the door?Yes.No.
1�The 3????, 3????, and 3???? shine brightl
�Investigate the door?Yes.No.
1�The 3????, 3????, and 3???? shine brightl
1�Huh?Adventurer?
1�You there! Help Orc friend!
1�Gah hah ha! Turtle cowards!Gedwad's plan work! Turtles think you Gedwad's army!Now Gedwad rest...
1�...Eh?Oh! Gedwad no say thank you to adventurer!
1�Thank you to adventurer!Gedwad saved by  !
1�How Gedwad know adventurer name?Trooper first class Raptorlegs Gedwad of Gochakzuk's Gravemakers know everything. Collecting information Gedwad's job!
1�Adventurer never hear of Gravemakers?Of course no hear of Gravemakers! Gravemakers secret team! Gravemakers...Ah! Forget what Gedwad say!
1�Gedwad use speed and cunning. Gedwad sneak into turtle lair and get information for mighty Empire.
1�But Gedwad have trouble. Turtles find Gedwad. Turtles send more guards. Now Gedwad no enter lair. Now Gedwad no use spybats...
1�Adventurer! You know why Gedwad blabber top-secret information to you?
1�Gedwad no need friend! Gedwad need Orcish axe to slice adventurer head!Adventurer more stupid than Orc!
1�If forces weak, Orc Empire attack and take cave! If Orc Empire take cave, less turtles for adventurers to fight! Orcs win, adventurers win!
1�Spybats do rest. When spybats get info, spybats fly back to Gedwad. When spybats fly back to Gedwad, adventurer gets gold. Easy mission! Easy mission!
1�Adventurer kill beastmen for gil, but adventurer no take beastman offer for gil. Adventurer more ruthless than Orc...
1�Noble Gedwad like noble adventurer spirit!

1�But adventurer ugly face no good for mission. Turtles no stupid. Turtles see adventurer, turtles kill adventurer. Turtles kill adventurer, Gedwad mission fail, Gochakzuk eat Gedwad liver for breakfast!
1�Adventurer need disguise...
1�Oh! Gedwad remember see lady make bone helmet in country of tasty Taru. Maybe she make you good disguise!
1�Gedwad stay here. When adventurer ready, come fast. Gedwad no like wait. Gedwad get hungry...eat spybats...
1�Adventurer slow. Gedwad give adventurer new name--Stubbylegs  . Gah ha hah!
1�Eh? What thing on Stubbylegs's head?
1�Quadav disguise?Turtle horde stupid, but not that stupid...
1�Wait... Maybe adventurer have plan!Yes! Adventurer have plan. Use funny helmet to fool stupid Quadav! Right?
1�Here. Take spybats. Put spybats somewhere inside cave.
1�Adventurer back! Adventurer in one piece!
1�.........Eh?Adventurer and spybats captured by turtle king? I told you disguise useless!
1�Eh?But if adventurer captured, why adventurer here?
1�.........Gedwad see. Turtle king smarter than thought. Maybe Orc attack too early.
1�Here, adventurer. Take reward.
1�Adventurer get caught, but learn much about strong Quadav defenses.
1�Adventurer be Orc enemy, but today, friend.
1�Gedwad tell Overlord of adventurer help, but he no listen...
1�Maybe when adventurer die, reborn as Orc! Then I teach adventurer to be real warrior! Gwahwahaw!
1�Not many with skin so soft can wi-ithstand such an onslaught.
1�I am impressed with your ski-ill, young recruit. Why not join the ranks of the Shieldwarriors as one of my pe-ersonal guards?

1�Excellent! You will make a fine addi-ition to my forces. Now nothing will pene-etrate our adamantium defe-enses!Ah yes, let me offer you a gift to show you my grati-itude. Place that fine he-elmet at the base of the banner yonder.
1�I see the fire of adve-enture burns bright in your eyes. Your talent would be wa-asted as a mere bodyguard...
1�Then why not be-ecome one of the Elite Raiders. Together we can launch an atta-ack on the empires of the East and fill our vaults with their hidden tre-easures!

1�Excellent! You will make a fine addi-ition to my forces. Now nothing will pene-etrate our adamantium defe-enses!Ah yes, let me offer you a gift to show you my grati-itude. Place that fine he-elmet at the base of the banner yonder.
1�That is unfo-ortunate. However, I admire your adama-antium will.
1�The least I can do is offer you a gift. Place that fine he-elmet at the base of the banner yonder.

1�An adve-enturer!Not only are you strong, but cunni-ing as well. My insti-incts tell me I should rip out your heart and throw your body to the land pugils. However, that does not change my admira-ation towards your fine display of fighting prowe-ess.
1�Deadeye! Come fo-orth!
1�Stand down, Deadeye. If I wa-anted the adventurer dead, I would have spli-it ?[him/her] in half myself.
1�What of the bats? I have known of this adve-enturer's meeting with the Orcish trooper and their plans for days.
1�Si-ilence, fool!There will be no more bloodshed here toda-ay. I shall release the adve-enturer and allow the Orc to return with his precious bats.
1�Do you question my judge-ement, Da'Vhu!?The Quadav have nothing to hide! Let anyone and anythi-ing step into our lair! Then, they too can witness the true might of the Shieldwarriors!

1�As for you. You are to se-erve this adventurer for as long as I wish it so. If ?[he/she] is to call you with this he-elmet, hurry to ?[his/her] aid, and fight as you would when fi-ighting an enemy of the Quadav.
1�And as your king, I am ordering you to swear an oath of loyalty to thi-is adventurer! I will send for you when I require your se-ervices once more.
1�Think of this as a cha-ance for you to show the rest of Vana'diel the true stre-ength of the Quadav! Do well, and I personally guarantee you a pla-ace by my side. Fail, and...
1�Consider yourself admoni-ished for your sins here today. You are free to go.
1�And tell that Orcish swine that if he wi-ishes to gather any more information, to come directly to my qua-arters. I shall tell him everything he wi-ishes to know...and more! Ahahahahah!
1�Today has been an eventful day for bo-oth of us, adventurer. However, I cannot guarantee that our next meeting will be as ple-easant.
1�I do wish a day would come when our peoples can join hands in ba-attle. However, I fear much more time is needed for the wounds dealt to us by the chi-ildren of Altana to heal...
1�Da'Vhu at your service, Your Highness.
1�Wh-what is this!?Your Highness! Have you sustained any injuries?Do you wish I do away with the intruder?
1�Of course, Your Highness.But what of the bats? I have reason to believe they were placed here by this intruder to spy on us!
1�O-of course, Your Highness!And now that we have captured the intruder, give the order, and I will dispose of ?[him/her] immediately.
1�B-but, Your Highness! They are the enemy!
1�B-but Your Highness. I have already sworn an oath of loyalty to you!
1�Your Highness! I shall not fail!
1�Farewell, adventurer. I pledge my life and allegiance to you, but only because my king so commands...
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.An Affable Adamantking?(pt.1).An Affable Adamantking?(pt.2).An Affable Adamantking?(pt.3).An Affable Adamantking?(pt.4).An Affable Adamantking?(pt.5).An Affable Adamantking?(pt.6).Mixed Signals.Magicite(pt.1).Magicite(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.

1�?[He/She] should be on ?[his/her] way to Beadeaux.When I said you were waiting for ?[him/her] there, ?[he/she] left immediately.
1�When you're dealing with an adventurer of  's stature, you gotta make things difficult if you want to slow ?[him/her] down.
1�And   knows better than to try anything too rrrisky.
1�You understand?You need some help.You need a friend.
1�What say?Easy mission!Good day!
